---
category: news
title: "First switch with on-chip neural network"
excerpt: "Broadcom Inc. has introduced what it claims is the first switch with an on-chip, neural network inference engine. Called Trident 5-X12, the software-programmable switch uses the networking general-purpose neural-network traffic analyzer (NetGNT) to double bandwidth and reduce power by 25% compared to previous devices."
